InsPlcyLimitTracking.name: InsPlcyLimitTracking
InsPlcyLimitTracking.description: Represents the calculated values based on the consumption of the policy and coverage attributes during claims processing.

CalcInitialAmount.description: The calculated currency amount that's used as the base value for tracking the policy attribute consumption.

CalcInitialValue.description: The count that's used as the base for tracking the policy attribute consumption.

ClaimCoverageId.description: The claim coverage that's associated with the insurance policy limit tracking.

ClaimCoveragePaymentDetailId.description: The claim coverage payment detail that's associated with the insurance policy limit tracking.

ClaimId.description: The claim that's associated with the insurance policy limit tracking.

ClaimItemId.description: The claim item that's associated with the insurance policy limit tracking.

InsPlcyLimitId.description: The insurance policy limit that's associated with the insurance limit tracking.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the insurance policy limit tracking.

PostedAmount.description: The amount posted by the claimant when submitting the claim.

PostedValue.description: The count that's populated when submitting the claim.

RemainingAmount.description: The remaining amount to carry forward for the next payment. It's the difference between the calculated initial amount and the requested amount.

RemainingValue.description: The remaining value to carry forward for the next payment. It's the difference between the calculated initial value and the requested value.

RequestedDate.description: The date on which the claim payment was requested.

TotalUsedAmount.description: The total amount used till date.

TotalUsedValue.description: The total value used till date.
